title: Number of U.S. Pinterest users 2017 , by gender
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Number of users in millions in each Sex on the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The highest Sex Female has 26.3 more Number of users in millions than the lowest Sex Male.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Number of users in millions in each Sex on the y axis.
Sex Female has the highest Number of users in millions and Male has the lowest Number of users in millions.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 2 number of Sexs.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The highest Sex Female has 26.3 more Number of users in millions than the lowest Sex Male.
The Sex Female tends to be 1.29 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Sexs, we get total 91.5.
